
name(The Mad Party)

snap(20,-30,-60)
sky(153,202,255)
fog(220,223,200)
clouds(255,255,255,2)
ground(201,204,183,1,-0.4,0.4)
distfog(11700) 
addon(1)

nlaps(10)

set(48,0,0,0)p
set(15,0,5600,0)p
set(15,0,11200,0)p
set(15,0,16800,0)p
set(20,0,22400,0)p
set(14,0,26950,-90)p
chk(40,-1670,26950,90)
set(14,-3500,26950,0)p
set(10,-3500,22400,0)p
set(10,-3500,16800,0)p
set(10,-3500,11200,0)p
set(10,-3500,5600,0)p
set(20,-3500,0,0)p
set(17,0,-4550,180)p
chk(42,-1670,-4550,90)
set(33,0,11200,180)
set(32,-3500,11200,180)
set(17,-3500,-4550,90)p


set(73,-1800,-2150,0)
set(73,-2425,9450,-90)
set(73,-1750,14050,0)
set(73,-2100,19650,90)
set(73,-1550,24150,180)
set(74,-2075,24700,-90)
set(74,-1650,425,90)
set(75,-1650,-2550,180)
set(75,-2000,10275,180)
set(75,-1712,18732,90)
set(75,-1376,25208,180)
set(74,-5366,7938,-90)
set(74,-5502,8970,180)
set(75,-1935,14070,0)
set(74,1838,19053,90)
set(74,1672,20885,0)
set(75,1833,6150,90)
set(73,1950,6722,180)
set(73,-5184,7436,-90)
set(74,-5171,768,0)
set(74,-5353,18889,90)
set(75,-5184,19617,180)
set(75,-5405,37,0)
set(75,2254,71,90)
set(74,1786,799,180)
set(74,2048,-2482,0)
set(73,-2086,973,90)
set(75,2152,20176,-90)
set(75,-1878,9550,-90)
set(74,1749,8208,-90)
set(67,1775,-7150,0)
set(65,-5450,-7550,0)
set(66,2250,-7500,90)

maxr(8,3000,-6000)
maxb(2,-8400,-4200)
maxl(8,-6600,-6000)
maxt(2,30000,-4200)
